original: Holmkvist, Bror Albert, redaktör, Göteborg, f. 8/9/67 i Karlskrona av flaggund :off. Edvard H. o. Dorotea Johansson. G. 10 m. Stanny Johansson. — Mog:ex. i Karlskrona 86. Res. t. bl. a. Tyskl, Frankr., Ital., Turk. o. Egypt. Medarb. i Blek. Läns Tidn. 87-03, i Gbgs-Posten 03-06, i Gbgs Hand:- o. Sjöfartstidn. 06-30, huv:red. o. ansv. utg. av Gbgs-Tidn. 11-20. Medl, av Pubhkl. o. Sv, journ:fören. Skr.: Halmstadslax o. fortepiano (95), Huller om buller (01), Abrakadabra (12), Revyn om Axel Engdahl (22), Blommor o. grodor (35), Otroligt men lögn (39), kås. o. humoresker i tidn. o. tidskr. Sign.: Purre.
translated: Holmkvist, Bror Albert, editor, Gothenburg, born September 8th, 1867 in Karlskrona to flag bearer officer Edvard H. and Dorotea Johansson. Married for 10 years to Stanny Johansson. Completed secondary school in Karlskrona in 1886. Traveled among other places to Germany, France, Italy, Turkey and Egypt. Worked as a contributor at Blekinge Läns Tidning from 1887 to 1903, at Göteborgs-Posten from 1903 to 1906, and at Göteborgs Handels- och Sjöfartstidning from 1906 to 1930. Served as chief editor and responsible publisher of Göteborgs-Tidningen from 1911 to 1920. Member of the Publicistklubben (Swedish Publicists' Association) and the Swedish Journalists' Association. Wrote Halmstadslax o. fortepiano (95), Huller om buller (01), Abrakadabra (12), Revyn om Axel Engdahl (22), Blommor o. grodor (35), Otroligt men lögn (39), and other comedic and satirical pieces for newspapers and magazines. Used the pseudonym "Purre".
